oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Report of the Board of Park Commissioners
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: animals; government; Memphis Zoo; Memphis Park Commission; parks; plants; Riverside Park; 1910s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Pages from the Report of the Board of Park Commissioners of Memphis, Tennessee, covering the years of 1913 to 1915. Document includes photos of former and present Park Commissioners, reports from multiple roleplayers, inventories, budgets, donor lists, photographs of parks and statistics. (NOTE: Original document dismantled. Some pages may be missing or out of order.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Board of Park Commissioners
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Cuts by H.E. Northrup Co., Memphis
oai_dc:dc.dc:format: 34 loose pages: 2 color and 32 black & white; Size: varies, but average is 6 x 9 in.
